nodes.text: The year 4016 before the Battle of Yavin (BBY) was a period of time during the era between the Manderon Period and the Old Sith Wars. Around that year, Vici Ramunee was born on the planet Alderaan.

4016 BBY

Approximate dates in other dating systems
Year 32,437 after the Tho Yor Arrival
Year 363 before the Treaty of Coruscant
Year 3,016 before the Ruusan Reformation
Year 3,981:3–3,980:2 before the Great ReSynchronization
[Source]
